items.title: Dashboard Consolidation
items.description: Unified spotter dashboard with Hazardous Weather Outlook (HWO), automatic activation detection, and all active alerts in one location.

items.title: Quick Maps
items.description: Added 6 essential weather and situational awareness tools including NWS radar, repeater map, NWSChat companion map, ARES map, GEMA dashboard, and NWS hazards view.

items.title: Enhanced Caching
items.description: HWO now cached for 4 hours (updates less frequently), while alerts continue to refresh every 5 minutes for real-time accuracy.

items.title: Component Architecture
items.description: Implemented dynamic header and footer components with integrated theme toggle and navigation system.

items.title: Sticky Navigation
items.description: Page navigation now remains visible while scrolling for easier access to page sections during severe weather events.

items.title: Unified Button Design
items.description: Consistent styling across all interactive elements with enhanced hover effects and accessibility improvements.

items.title: Alerts Page
items.description: Created dedicated alerts page showing all NWS Atlanta warnings, watches, and advisories.

items.title: Mobile Navigation
items.description: Improved mobile hamburger menu with better touch targets and accessibility.

items.title: Complete CSS Refactor
items.description: Mobile-first redesign with CSS Grid and Flexbox, improved accessibility with ARIA attributes.

items.title: Dark Mode Support
items.description: Automatic light/dark mode based on system preferences with custom theme toggle.
